titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid to the Nancy M. Tucker Philadelphia Reminder Day photographs, July 4, 1969 Coll2012.099
Tucker (Nancy M.) Philadelphia Reminder Day Photographs
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by John Thompson and Kyle Morgan

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-05-05T08:57-0700

did.unittitle: Nancy M. Tucker Philadelphia Reminder Day photographs
did.abstract: Nancy M. Tucker photographs of the 5th Annual Reminder Day in Philadelphia, July 4, 1969. Includes images of Barbara Gittings and Frank Kameny.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to researchers. There are no access restrictions.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Researchers wishing to publish material must obtain permission in writing from ONE National Gay Lesbian Archives as the physical owner of the material. Note that permission to publish does not constitute copyright clearance. ONE National Gay Lesbian Archives can grant copyright clearance only for those materials for which we hold copyright. It is the responsibility of the researcher to obtain copyright clearance for all other materials from the copyright holder(s).

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processing this collection has been funded by a generous grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Nancy M. Tucker Philadelphia Reminder Day Photographs, Coll2012-099, ONE National Gay Lesbian Archives, Los Angeles, California
